evidence.source_document: Motion of the U.S. House of Representatives to Intervene with Incorporated memorandum of Law
evidence.text: the House will, at a minimum, appeal this Court’s decision

evidence.source_document: Plaintiffs Jane Doe and Susan Roe's Response and Objection to Notice Filed by the U.S. House of Representatives
evidence.text: "After the district court denied the motions to intervene, they appealed; shortly thereafter, the parties agreed to dismiss the district court action and moved to also dismiss the would-be intervenors’ appeal. CVLR Performance Horses, Inc. v. Wynne, 792 F.3d 469 (4th Cir. 2015)"

extracted.value: Appeal: Plaintiffs in CVLR Performance Horses, Inc. v. Wynne appealed to 4th Circuit Court of Appeals
